description: This Python source file is a test suite using pytest for testing Angular project templates within a larger project context. It includes fixtures to set up temporary directories and mock template files, and contains multiple test functions that validate template initialization information, project creation, post-processing execution, configuration loading, and variable substitution. The file interacts with classes like ProjectConfig, ProjectType, TemplateInitInfo, and AngularTemplate, focusing on the Angular project template.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Fixture to create and clean up a temporary directory for test outputs.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture to create a mock Angular template directory with configuration and files.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture to create a sample project configuration for testing.

methods.name: test_angular_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Test that verifies retrieval of template initialization info contains correct command.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Test that checks project files are generated correctly with placeholder replacements.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Test that verifies post-processing scripts are executed successfully.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Test loading of project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Test variable substitution in template files during project initialization.
